means: 粪石学，（通过粪便诊断疾病的）粪便学

PerfectNetExp.abs: scatemia 肠性毒血症scatology 粪便学scatoma 粪结

list.abs: scansorial 攀附的scatologic method 粪便分析法scats 粪便
...义(anatomival)，后来又认为带有医学上的粪便学意义(scatological)，而现在则认为带有恐犬症(caniphobic)的含义。
三一九症候群之二， 政治「 食粪（scatological）症」，患了这种政治身心病症，会把身体入口的「饮食」与出口的「排泄」混为一谈…

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Greek skōr, skat- 'dung' + -logy

means.word_mean: 2. (medicine) the chemical analysis of excrement (for medical diagnosis or for paleontological purposes)

auth_sentence.content: Do children love scatology for its own sake, or for an even more fundamental reason because it irritates adults?
